mapper.select: select pt.type as kpi_type,pt.points_make as kpi,pt.points,tt.reason,tt.dept_points,tt.staff_id,tt.staff_name,tt.dept_id as dept_id from (select * from edu_points_type where type in ('德','勤','能','绩') ) pt LEFT JOIN (select * from (select sum(dept_points)as dept_points,GROUP_CONCAT(reason) as reason,staff_id,points_type_id,dept_id,staff_name from ( SELECT p.remark AS reason, p.points AS dept_points, s.sys_id AS staff_id, s.`name` AS staff_name, p.points_type_id, s.dept_id FROM edu_points p LEFT JOIN edu_staff s ON s.sys_id = p.tea_id AND p.add_time BETWEEN #{addTime} AND #{andTime}) t group by staff_id,points_type_id,dept_id,staff_name ) t where t.staff_id = #{staffId}) tt on tt.points_type_id=pt.sys_id and pt.type in ('德','勤','能','绩') order by pt.create_time asc
mapper.update:
update kpi_notes set
kpi = #{kpi},
dept_points = #{deptPoints},
reason = #{reason},
ad_check = #{adCheck},
update_time = now() where sys_id = #{sysId}
mapper.delete: delete from kpi_notes where serial_num = #{serialNum} and staff_id = #{staffId}
